title: 我的世界死亡掉落怎么开
author: JiuYan
txt_content:
/gamerule keepInventory false 没用
是死亡掉落- -

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content:
输入命令：
/gamerule keepInventory true复制代码

replies.author: jsahnc
replies.txt_content: 在命令方块输入/gamerule keepInventory false/open

replies.author: yjw2625590539
replies.txt_content: /gamerule keepInventory true 每个世界输入一遍就好了~{:10_492:}
